Package command_pattern

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
    PlayerAction
    The client An interface that creates all Receivers
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionButton
    Interpreter acts as the invoker, listening to what the player wants and linking up a relevant action for a method to do
    BootCamp
    Returns the type of action to be used
    Parser
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
    Player
    A receiver of the command pattern and a controller of the MVC design All player actions are set here The controller links to the printer, which is the view part of the MVC
    PlayerDrops
    The player wants to drop an item
    PlayerGives
    The player wants to give an item to another player
    PlayerGoes
    The player wants to go in a direction, normally through an exit
    PlayerHelp
    The player needs some helpful guidance
    PlayerLooks
    The player wants to inspect the room
    PlayerQuits
    The player wants to quit
    PlayerTakes
    The player wants to take an item from the room
    Print
    Print Class containing all print methods
